p: Outdoor workers in certain occupational sectors such as agriculture, construction, transportation, utility maintenance, oil production, firefighting and other emergency services are usually among the first to experience the effects of climate change. These are exacerbated in most instances by the need to wear protective clothing, which can lead to heat stress.
